WorkItem.Description:
Triumphant Armor that require Trophy of the Crusade do not read the tokens right. Since it uses two tokens instead of one.
Â 
I started wondering and looked into the source code and was able to make show the 2nd item (attached mostly around line 340-356). The only downside is it not saving both tokens to the data. This however makes it so the Trophy filter does work as band aid type of fix... Hope this helps

Comments.Message:
Could you:
A) Better clarify what exactly it is you are fixing and how you fixed it
B) Post files that change Source Code in the PATCHES section so that its recorded as a Patch

This item already fixed in next patch...

The problem was the information would show up as requiring 1 Emblem of Triumph. This is now listed as the same as a token since nothing is just 1 Emblem of Triumph...
